name: Adjuntas, Puerto Rico
barrios: Domingo Massol is a rural, elementary school located in Saltillo barrio, offering grades K \xe2\x80\x93 6 with about 114 students.
Domingo Pietri Ruiz is an urban, elementary school offering K \xe2\x80\x93 3 grades with about 425 students.
Rafael Aparicio Jimenez is an urban, intermediate school offering grades 7 \xe2\x80\x93 9 with about 385 students.[65]
Hector I Rivera is a rural school located in Yahuecas barrio, offering K \xe2\x80\x93 8 with about 240 students.
Jose Emilio Lugo is an urban, high school located in Urbanizaci\xc3\xb3n Cerros, offering grades 10 \xe2\x80\x93 12 with over 600 students.
